message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a great price. I think you'll really love it!
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I'm interested but $180 is a bit more than I'm willing to spend.  How about $120? Let me know what you think.
I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob. I can do $160, but I'm not sure I can go any lower than that. What do you think?
I appreciate the compromise, Alice, but $160 is still a bit high for me.  I'm sticking to my original offer of $120. If that's not possible, I'll have to look at other options.
